alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Jones; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:28PM EDT until August 07 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Baldwin County in central Georgia... Wilkinson County in central Georgia... Northeastern Twiggs County in central Georgia... Washington County in east central Georgia... Southeastern Jones County in central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Linton to near Ivey to near Mountain Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sandersville, Irwinton, Gordon, Davisboro, Tennille, Ivey, McIntyre, Harrison, Toomsboro, Oconee, Deepstep, Riddleville, Midway-Hardwick, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Hebron, James, Coopers, and Fitzpatrick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
